Result<T> - Interface in uk.co.josephearl.result
A discriminated union that encapsulates a successful outcome with a value of type T or a failure with an arbitrary Throwable exception.
Result.Failure<T> - Record Class in uk.co.josephearl.result
A Result representing a failure.
Result.Success<T> - Record Class in uk.co.josephearl.result
A Result representing a successful outcome.
